subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade saw Dorell Wright throw the ball in the air as time expired, then pumped a fist and pointed up. He could finally feel some relief Saturday — the Miami Heat’s epic losing streak had finally ended.
snippet: Dwyane Wade saw Dorell Wright throw the ball in the air as time expired, then pumped a fist and pointed up. He could finally feel some relief Saturday — the Miami Heat’s epic losing streak had finally ended.
